summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1283, for the improvement of East Olive Street, from Thirty-seventh Avenue to Fortieth Avenue, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues therein named, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks, catch basins and other appurtenances, under Ordinance No. 13975, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
